title: SOLD: T206 Huggins (HOF) portrait SGC 40 w/SC 350

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Huggins (HOF) portrait SGC 40 w/SC 350
posts.post_content:
CARD HAS BEEN SOLD!  Thanks Jim!

T206 Miller Huggins (HOFer) portrait with a Sweet Caporal 350/30 back.  

Grade is an SGC 40.

First to email me with intent to purchase gets the card.

Email: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

I will accept check, MO, or paypal.

Price is: $65 shipped.



[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/Type%20Cards/1909-11T-206HugginsMillerportraitno.jpg[/IMG]

Bump for price reduction.

Price lowered to $65 shipped.

Paypal OK.

Eric,
My e-mail is [url]jrths07@yahoo.com[/url]  Thanks!
Jim
Thanks Jim.....Huggins is yours.  Email sent back.
